text: Blund's Lullaby is a 2017 Swedish two-minute-long horror short film directed, produced and written by Magda Lindblom and Amanda Nilsson. The short film is set in The Conjuring Universe and was made for the "My Annabelle Creation" contest which it won for Sweden. It was released September 14, 2017, on YouTube. Its plot concerns John Blund, the Nordic version of the Sandman. ==Production== The short film stars Agnes and Mathilda Melin. ==References== ==External links== * Blund's Lullaby on YouTube Category:The Conjuring Universe
title: Blund's Lullaby
